meta.description: Optimize the selection of food items to meet nutritional requirements at the least cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items to choose from.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content of each food item in grams.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content of each food item in grams.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of selected food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 87 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 135 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1926 calories are consumed.
